Layout


 struct XrGraphicsRequirementsVulkan2KHR {
     XrStructureType type;

     XrVersion minApiVersionSupported;
     XrVersion maxApiVersionSupported;
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • XrGraphicsRequirementsVulkan2KHR

      public XrGraphicsRequirementsVulkan2KHR(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a XrGraphicsRequirementsVulkan2KHR instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
